info.title: SenseHome Technologies API
info.description: Complete API for managing smart home hubs, devices, notifications, and Firebase Cloud Messaging. Includes device management, user authentication, real-time notifications, and comprehensive data seeding capabilities.

post.description: Authenticate and login to a specific hub using hub ID

400.description: Invalid hub ID or login failed

post.description: Register a new hub with user email

get.summary: Get all hubs for a user
get.description: Retrieve all hubs associated with a user's email

404.description: No hubs found for this email

get.description: Retrieve a specific hub by its ID

put.description: Update hub properties including name and users

delete.description: Delete a hub by its ID and type

get.summary: Get all devices for a hub
get.description: Retrieve all devices associated with a specific hub
Retrieve a specific device by its ID

post.description: Create a new device in the system

put.description: Update device properties. Automatically sends Firebase notifications to all hub users when device is updated.

200.description: Device updated successfully. Firebase notifications sent to all hub users.

post.description: Create a new notification in the system

get.description: Retrieve all notifications with pagination support

get.summary: Get all notifications for a hub
get.description: Retrieve all notifications for a specific hub with pagination support
Retrieve all available device types in the system

get.summary: Get device history for a hub
get.description: Retrieve device history entries for a specific hub with pagination support

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of history entries per page

delete.description: Delete a notification by its ID

post.description: Create a new history entry for a device

get.description: Retrieve all available device types in the system

post.description: Create a new division (room) in a hub

BearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from hub login

email.description: User email to associate with the hub

users.description: List of user emails associated with the hub

description.example: Device Luz LED Sala 1 was updated
Device Luz LED Sala 1 was updated
